item.title: Justin Timberlake Reveals Lyme Disease Diagnosis
item.description: “Living with this can be relentlessly debilitating, both mentally and physically,” the singer said on social media.

item.title: Justin Timberlake Reveals Lyme Disease Diagnosis, Battled ‘Nerve Pain, Crazy Fatigue’ and More on Tour but Refused to Cancel Shows: ‘I’m So Glad I Kept Going’
item.description: Justin Timberlake has revealed that he has been diagnosed with Lyme disease and opened up about the struggles he’s faced while on his “Forget Tomorrow World Tour.” The singer posted
